verses.verse: He that dasheth in pieces <WH6327> <WH8688> is come up <WH5927> <WH8804> before thy face <WH6440>: keep <WH5341> <WH8800> the munition <WH4694>, watch <WH6822> <WH8761> the way <WH1870>, make thy loins <WH4975> strong <WH2388> <WH8761>, fortify <WH553> <WH8761> thy power <WH3581> mightily <WH3966>.

For the YY <WH3068> hath turned away <WH7725> <WH8804> the excellency <WH1347> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, as the excellency <WH1347> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: for the emptiers <WH1238> <WH8802> have emptied them out <WH1238> <WH8804>, and marred <WH7843> <WH8765> their vine branches <WH2156>.

The shield <WH4043> of his mighty men <WH1368> is made red <WH119> <WH8794>, the valiant <WH2428> men <WH582> are in scarlet <WH8529> <WH8794>: the chariots <WH7393> shall be with flaming <WH784> torches <WH6393> in the day <WH3117> of his preparation <WH3559> <WH8687>, and the fir trees <WH1265> shall be terribly shaken <WH7477> <WH8717>.

The chariots <WH7393> shall rage <WH1984> <WH8704> in the streets <WH2351>, they shall justle one against another <WH8264> <WH8698> in the broad ways <WH7339>: they shall seem <WH4758> like torches <WH3940>, they shall run <WH7323> <WH8787> like the lightnings <WH1300>.

He shall recount <WH2142> <WH8799> his worthies <WH117>: they shall stumble <WH3782> <WH8735> in their walk <WH1979>; they shall make haste <WH4116> <WH8762> to the wall <WH2346> thereof, and the defence <WH5526> <WH8802> shall be prepared <WH3559> <WH8717>.
The gates <WH8179> of the rivers <WH5104> shall be opened <WH6605> <WH8738>, and the palace <WH1964> shall be dissolved <WH4127> <WH8738>.

And Huzzab <WH5324> <WH8717> shall be led away captive <WH1540> <WH8795>, she shall be brought up <WH5927> <WH8717>, and her maids <WH519> shall lead <WH5090> <WH8764> her as with the voice <WH6963> of doves <WH3123>, tabering <WH8608> <WH8781> upon their breasts <WH3824>.

But Ninveh <WH5210> is of old <WH3117> like a pool <WH1295> of water <WH4325>: yet they shall flee away <WH5127> <WH8801>. Stand <WH5975> <WH8798>, stand <WH5975> <WH8798>, shall they cry; but none shall look back <WH6437> <WH8688>.

Take ye the spoil <WH962> <WH8798> of silver <WH3701>, take the spoil <WH962> <WH8798> of gold <WH2091>: for there is none end <WH7097> of the store <WH8498> and glory <WH3519> out of all the pleasant <WH2532> furniture <WH3627>.

She is empty <WH950>, and void <WH4003>, and waste <WH1110> <WH8794>: and the heart <WH3820> melteth <WH4549> <WH8738>, and the knees <WH1290> smite together <WH6375>, and much pain <WH2479> is in all loins <WH4975>, and the faces <WH6440> of them all gather <WH6908> <WH8765> blackness <WH6289>.

Where is the dwelling <WH4583> of the lions <WH738>, and the feedingplace <WH4829> of the young lions <WH3715>, where the lion <WH738>, even the old lion <WH3833>, walked <WH1980> <WH8804>, and the lion's <WH738> whelp <WH1482>, and none made them afraid <WH2729> <WH8688> ?

The lion <WH738> did tear in pieces <WH2963> <WH8802> enough <WH1767> for his whelps <WH1484>, and strangled <WH2614> <WH8764> for his lionesses <WH3833>, and filled <WH4390> <WH8762> his holes <WH2356> with prey <WH2964>, and his dens <WH4585> with ravin <WH2966>.

Behold, I am against thee, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, and I will burn <WH1197> <WH8689> her chariots <WH7393> in the smoke <WH6227>, and the sword <WH2719> shall devour <WH398> <WH8799> thy young lions <WH3715>: and I will cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> thy prey <WH2964> from the earth <WH776>, and the voice <WH6963> of thy messengers <WH4397> shall no more be heard <WH8085> <WH8735>.
